verbs.description: italian community center sale to [V: rensselaer] [ARG0: county] uncertain rensselaer county purchase of the italian community center to serve as new senior center has stalled as the county reconsiders buying the building and the non - profit looks to see if there may be other interested purchasers the county purchase of the icc building at 1450 fifth ave with its 108-space parking lot for 685 000 as a new home for the troy area senior services center which was to relocate from the former masonic lodge at 19 third st richard crist mike cazzato international christian concern rensselaer polytechnic institute troy troy area senior services center italian community center charitable foundation italian community center rensselaer county new york kathleen m jimino
